channel.title: Need help as soon as possible!
channel.description:
My shops do not work. I can get the npc to spawn, even talk to to trade, but then there's the problem that the items won't show up in the shop! I have tried redoing all the codes, and i have followed tuts exactly, and still the shop is blank with no items. I have tried reloading the source (WinterLove v.3) and still no luck, I have done a huge amount of editing, and would rather not have to start over again.. I'm thinking it might be a problem somewhere in code that is not autospawn.cfg, or shops.cfg... I have it placed correctly into client.java. So maybe the issue is within another file..? Or perhaps in in a weird section of client.java i don't know? I'm pretty sure i need help from a decent coder, or just anyone that also had this problem. Any suggestions/help highly appreciated!
Thanks so much anyone that can help me!
~jAnDa

item.title: Need help as soon as possible!
item.dc:creator: @Vesnal1 Vesnal1
item.description:
@Vesnal1 wrote:

Make sure you have items added in item.cfg seems like the most obvious problem. Other than that, I don’t know what the problem is. Good luck and if you could post examples of what you have done, that would help a lot.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help as soon as possible!

item.title: Need help as soon as possible!

I meant my npc is there, and when i trade it, there are no items in the shop. lol
Any suggestions?

I can get the npc to spawn, even talk to to trade, but then there’s the problem that the items won’t show up in the shop!
